proximity_publisher.py
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 import rospy
3 from sensor_msgs.msg import Range
4 from robotic_skin.sensor.vl53l1x import VL53L1X_ProximitySensor
5 import argparse
6 import rospkg
7 
8 
9 def publish_proximity(config_file, debug):
10  """
11  Publish Proximity Values from sensor in ROS Range msg
12  :param config_file: str
13  The full path of config_file which contains all required files mentioned in the fields of respective sensor's
14  docstring
15  :param debug: bool
16  To turn On or Off the debug messages printing to std out
17  :return: None
18  """
19  ps = VL53L1X_ProximitySensor(config_file)
20  rospy_node_name = 'proximity_publisher_%s' % (ps.config_dict['proximity_sensor_number'])
21  rospy.init_node(rospy_node_name, anonymous=True)
22  pub = rospy.Publisher('/proximity_data%s' % (ps.config_dict['proximity_sensor_number']), Range, queue_size=10)
23  rate = rospy.Rate(100) # Start publishing at 100hz
24  range_msg = Range()
25  range_msg.radiation_type = 1
26  range_msg.min_range = 0
27  range_msg.max_range = 3
28  # Reference: https://www.st.com/resource/en/datasheet/vl53l1x.pdf
29  range_msg.field_of_view = 39.60
30  while not rospy.is_shutdown():
31  range_msg.header.stamp = rospy.Time.now()
32  range_msg.range = ps.read()
33  if debug:
34  print(range_msg)
35  pub.publish(range_msg)
36  rate.sleep()
37  ps.stop()
38 
39 
40 if __name__ == "__main__":
41  parser = argparse.ArgumentParser()
42  parser.add_argument('--config_file', action="store",
43  dest="config_file", required=True,
44  help="The configuration yaml file name in package's config folder")
45  parser.add_argument('--DEBUG', action="store",
46  dest="debug", required=False, default=False,
47  help="Whether to print debug strings or not")
48  args = parser.parse_args()
49  ros_robotic_skin_path = rospkg.RosPack().get_path('ros_robotic_skin')
50  config_file = ros_robotic_skin_path + "/config/" + args.config_file
51  publish_proximity(config_file, args.debug)
